staxel.village.dialogue.CursedCurator.li: (안함)Eh? What? Are these arms? Legs?
(안함)Am I me again?
(안함)Astounding! Fantastic!
(안함)What did you do?
(안함)Ahh. You cannot imagine how wonderful it is to have arms and legs again!
(안함)There is nothing quite comparable to spending a few decades as an insect...
(안함)Ah, but I seem to be getting ahead of myself.
(안함)I am ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;, once curator of a magnificent museum in a faraway land.
(안함)How did I come to be an insect?
(안함)Hmm... I do believe we should gloss over that for now.
(안함)Perhaps if you pay me a visit ^c:1486b0;on the morrow^c:pop;, we might discuss a few details?
(안함)I must first reaccustom myself to this body and finally get some rest.
(안함)You have no idea how long those blasted spiders were chasing me!
(안함)Please, allow me a day to rest before we begin our discussions.
(안함)Come back ^c:1486b0;on the morrow^c:pop;.
(안함)Ah, what a fine day to be humanoid again!
(안함)I cannot believe how comfortable the tavern floor was last night!
(안함)So. To business!
(안함)I took the liberty of examining your 'village' in the early morning hours.
(안함)As I suspected, and much to my horror I might add, you lack a ^c:1486b0;museum^c:pop;.
(안함)Perhaps you are not aware, but ^c:1486b0;museums^c:pop; are of paramount importance in these settings.
(안함)Where else will you store and display all the valuables you uncover?
(안함)As such, I must impose upon you to construct such a venue.
(안함)I have heard that you are already familiar with construction.
(안함)I trust you to take care of the rest!
(안함)Ah, but it is hard to find ways to occupy my time.
(안함)I do hope things are progressing well with the ^c:1486b0;museum^c:pop;!
(안함)I find myself particularly looking forward to the insect wing.
(안함)Fantastic! Magnificent! A true marvel!
(안함)In case it was not apparent, these are my impressions upon seeing our new ^c:1486b0;museum^c:pop;!
(안함)I cannot adequately express my thanks!
(안함)First you restore me to humanoid form, then you erect a ^c:1486b0;museum^c:pop; in my honour.
(안함)I am humbled. Truly. For your services, please take this.
(안함)That right there is an ^c:d03e37;unpolished fossil^c:pop;.
(안함)You might find them if you break rocks lying around the island.
(안함)The ^c:d03e37;polishing machine^c:pop; can be used to clean up old ^c:d03e37;fossils^c:pop; for the museum and expand your collection!
(안함)Should you ever find any interesting collectables, do come and see me!
(안함)You are also free to populate the displays with them!
(안함)I cannot wait to see you expand our insect collection!
(안함)Oh my! Is that a new discovery? I must record it immediately!
(안함)For this one, I can award you ^c:d03e37;{0-newPoints} Vorlen encyclopaedia points^c:pop;, bringing your total to ^c:d03e37;{1-points}^c:pop;.
(안함)Goodness! {0-count} new discoveries! Allow me to add them to my records.
(안함)For these you earn ^c:d03e37;{0-newPoints} Vorlen encyclopaedia points^c:pop;, bringing your total to ^c:d03e37;{1-points}^c:pop;.
(안함)Aha! Now this is a moment I have been anticipating!
(안함)Collectable discoveries must be recorded!
(안함)Come to me each time you make a new discovery and I will bestow upon you ^c:d03e37;Vorlen encyclopaedia points^c:pop;!
(안함)Collect enough and extravagant treasures could be yours!
(안함)For this batch of {0-count}, I will award you ^c:d03e37;{1-newPoints} points^c:pop;, bringing your total to ^c:d03e37;{2-points}^c:pop;.
(안함)Fabulous! You have broken ^c:d03e37;100 Vorlen encyclopaedia points^c:pop;!
(안함)To commemorate this first milestone, I have prepared a set of ^c:d03e37;5 unpolished fossils^c:pop;.
(안함)Perhaps one might turn out to be a rarity!
(안함)As a curator, I admit to a passing interest in monsters from the past.
(안함)Those wails coming from the forest, however...
(안함)I would rather not be the one confirming their source.
(안함)Ah, I see you have amassed over ^c:d03e37;200 points^c:pop;.
(안함)Perhaps this will be a somewhat unorthodox reward, but I no longer have room for this painting.
(안함)Keep up the excellent work!
(안함)Marvellous, ^c:d03e37;300 points^c:pop;. I have met few people as studious of their surroundings!
(안함)Perhaps someday we will manage to catalogue the entire island!
(안함)Goodness! ^c:d03e37;400 points^c:pop; already?
(안함)You must be quite the avid historian!
(안함)Almost reminds me of my younger self.
(안함)Incredible! I never thought to see someone reach ^c:d03e37;500 points^c:pop;!
(안함)For now, this is as much as I can offer you.
(안함)I used to travel the world, digging up ancient treasures in those togs!
(안함)But perhaps the time has come to pass on the mantle. May they serve you well!
(안함)Ah, good day, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)Of late, I have found myself wondering if we could somehow expand the ^c:1486b0;museum^c:pop; further...
(안함)That is not to say you have done anything less than a magnificent job thus far, but...
(안함)There is always room for improvement, correct?
(안함)If you were to check the ^c:d03e37;museum's signpost^c:pop;, you would most likely find a second set of requirements!
(안함)Please do come back once these have been fulfilled!
(안함)How fares the expansion of the ^c:1486b0;museum^c:pop;, if I may ask?
(안함)Do let me know when the work is complete!
(안함)But it would appear you have already done just that! Marvellous work!
(안함)Now, there is one other thing I have sought for many a year...
(안함)It would be the crowning jewel of our extravagant collection!
(안함)I speak of a certain ^c:1486b0;painting^c:pop; with no little sentimental value...
(안함)There have been rumours that a passing ^c:1486b0;Murmur^c:pop;—you know, the fellows at the stalls—has it in their possession...
(안함)Could you perhaps talk to each of them in turn and see if you can locate it?
(안함)Excellent work, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! You never fail to impress!
(안함)The search goes well, I hope?
(안함)It is rather important that I recover this ^c:1486b0;painting^c:pop;...
(안함)The ^c:1486b0;Murmurs^c:pop; in the ^c:1486b0;town square^c:pop; might know something of it...
(안함)No luck with the travelling ^c:1486b0;Murmurs^c:pop;, I suppose?
(안함)Ah, this is just my luck. First turned into a butterfly, now denied the butterfly I seek...
(안함)Did you learn anything? Anything at all?
(안함)Hm. Yes. So those are the terms...
(안함)I know what it is they seek. I suppose they leave me no choice...
(안함)Come back in a few days and perhaps we will be able to marvel at our new treasure.
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Excellent timing!
(안함)Only an hour ago the ^c:1486b0;painting^c:pop; arrived on my doorstep!
(안함)Hurry! You must hang it on the ^c:1486b0;museum^c:pop; wall that all might admire it!
(안함)I have done as they requested...
(안함)Now we need only wait for them to uphold their end of the deal.
(안함)There is no need to dally, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
(안함)The ^c:1486b0;painting^c:pop; is crying out to be hung on the ^c:1486b0;museum^c:pop; wall!
(안함)Beautiful, is she not?
(안함)Truly the Maxentius Aureus of our collection!
(안함)Ah, I should provide you with some sort of reward for your hard work!
(안함)Do come by often with new artefacts!
(안함)Not many of the other villagers seem to share our interests!
(안함)Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, what is this?
(안함)My daughter is seeking items that belonged to her mother?
(안함)That sounds...ominous, I must say. Very ominous indeed...
(안함)But who am I to deny her a trinket that once belonged to my lovely wife?
(안함)I must warn you, however, to ensure that she does not do anything too stupid...
(안함)Remember, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, the responsibility now lies with you.
(안함)Good day, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)Did you manage to apprehend the beast said to lurk within the forests?
(안함)...a woman you say? Caith? Witch? Blonde hair?
(안함)Well this is a surprise! I did not think to encounter her again so soon after regaining my human form...
(안함)My daughter can be...a bit erratic at times. That came entirely from her mother, I'm sure.
(안함)I...I suppose I should see her...
(안함)I just hope I do not end up a butterfly once more!
(안함)A pleasure as always, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
(안함)^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; was by earlier, admiring our collection!
(안함)It is rather rare to see her venture into the village.
(안함)I have recently been thinking quite a bit about my missing daughter.
(안함)Perhaps you recall her from the ^c:1486b0;painting^c:pop;?
(안함)No, no. Not the ^c:1486b0;Rainbow Butterfly^c:pop;! The girl!
(안함)She has been on my mind quite a bit recently...
(안함)But on to business! ^c:1486b0;Butterflies^c:pop; are the trend once again!
(안함)Would you mind going out to catch me one? Any will do!
(안함)^c:1486b0;Butterflies^c:pop; being a bit too flighty today?
(안함)I look forward to seeing what you manage to catch!
(안함)Well now, this is a magnificent specimen!
(안함)Well done, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)Unfortunately, it is not quite the specimen I have need of right now...
(안함)But perhaps this would be easier if we had a comprehensive taxonomic catalogue...
(안함)^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop; should know this island well.
(안함)Could I trouble you to seek them out?
(안함)Excellent work, a full list of local ^c:1486b0;butterflies^c:pop;!
(안함)But... It would appear the butterfly I seek does not number amongst them...
(안함)Ah well. What else can I possibly do...
(안함)^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; might know, but I am loathe to trouble her with it...
(안함)If only my daughter were here...
(안함)Perhaps she would know.
(안함)But enough of my lamenting! You carried out your task!
(안함)This is not much, but perhaps it will contribute to the expansion of our collection!
(안함)Come by whenever you have something new to show me!
(안함)I anticipate magnificent discoveries!
(안함)^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop; should be somewhere around.
(안함)Please ask them what they know about the island's local species.
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, I have decided it is time to be frank with you.
(안함)I am enamoured with the ^c:1486b0;Rainbow Butterfly^c:pop;.
(안함)I must find her, no matter the cost.
(안함)We came across each other but once, while I still wore my lepidopteran form.
(안함)You may realise now the meaning of your previous tasks.
(안함)There is but one avenue left—I must ask you to go to ^c:1486b0;{0-daughter}^c:pop;.
(안함)As to why I will not go myself...let us leave that aside.
(안함)Have you spoken to my daughter yet?
(안함)Many speak of your almost supernatural ability to locate the island's inhabitants!
(안함)I trust it might aid you in finding ^c:1486b0;{0-daughter}^c:pop;.
(안함)Ah! ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! That is the one!
(안함)But...this is perhaps not quite how I had expected this meeting to work...
(안함)Communication seems...rather difficult in this form.
(안함)Perhaps you could discuss the problem further with ^c:1486b0;{0-daughter}^c:pop;?
(안함)Please hurry to ^c:1486b0;{0-daughter}^c:pop;!
(안함)She will know what needs to be done!
(안함)Oh! Is that what I think it is?
(안함)Let us see how well this works!
(안함)I only hope it does not have entirely the opposite intended effect...
(안함)It is her! At last! In the flesh!
(안함)More beauteous than I had ever imagined!
(안함)I...I suspected this might happen.
(안함)All I truly wanted was the opportunity to speak to her.
(안함)To give her my thanks.
(안함)Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I cannot thank you enough...
(안함)We still have more to speak about, she and I, but you need worry yourself about it no more!
(안함)I will take responsibility and seek out the potion to turn her back.
(안함)I can only avoid ^c:1486b0;{0-daughter}^c:pop; for so long...
(안함)Do come by with any artefacts you find! I shall always be waiting.
(안함)Perhaps we could consider moving the museum into your home someday?
(안함)That could be a new experience!
(안함)Wha–?
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! What is this?
(안함)Did my daughter put you up to something again...
(안함)She did, didn't she?
(안함)How are you feeling?
(안함)Just fine, actually.
(안함)Oh...wait...
(안함)I think... I think I feel an episode of butterfly coming on...
(안함)Just kidding!
(안함)Was that supposed to do something?
